data.eml:eml: Review of the subgenus Geron (Geron) Meigen in the Nearctic Region (Diptera: Bombyliidae: Toxophorinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hall, Jack C., Evenhuis, Neal L. (2003): Review of the subgenus Geron (Geron) Meigen in the Nearctic Region (Diptera: Bombyliidae: Toxophorinae). Zootaxa 181: 1-72, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156842
